action.action-desc: Ms. Lummis introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Congressional Award Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Congressional Award Program Reauthorization Act.

subsection.text: Section 108 of the Congressional Award Act (2 U.S.C. 808) is amended by striking October 1, 2023 and inserting October 1, 2028.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect as if enacted on October 1, 2023.
